lead_paragraph: Now, at this moment, when the fate of Egypt hangs in the balance, and Mr. Churchill tells the House of Commons that these are "times of mortal peril," let us reaffirm our faith in British courage, British endurance, British honor. Now, above all other times, let us give thanks for three years of steady courage and uncomplaining sacrifice on the part of the British people.
abstract: Ed urging US faith in Brit
